0000000_00000_00000_000_00101_0110011   //PC= 0  add $x5,$0,$0
000000001010_00000_000_00110_0010011    //PC= 4  addi $x6,$0,10
0000000_00000_00101_010_00000_0100011   //PC= 8  sw $0,0($x5)
0000000_00110_00101_010_00100_0100011   //PC=12  sw $x6,4($x5)
000000000100_00101_010_11110_0000011    //PC=16  lw $x30,4($x5)
0000000_00110_11110_000_11111_0110011   //PC=20  add $x31,$x30,$x6     (hazard!)
000000001101_00000_000_00111_0010011    //PC=24  addi $x7,$0,13        (stall 1 cycle)
0000001_00110_00110_000_11100_0110011   //PC=28  mul $x28,$x6,$x6
0000000_00000_00000_000_01100_1100011   //PC=32  beq $0, $0, Jump
000000000001_00110_000_00110_0010011    //PC=36  addi $x6,$x6,1        (flush)
000000000001_00110_000_00110_0010011    //PC=40  addi $x6,$x6,1
0100000_00110_00111_000_00111_0110011   //PC=44  Jump: sub $x7,$x7,$x6
0000000_00111_00110_111_11100_0110011   //PC=48  and $x28,$x6,$x7
0000000_11100_00111_110_11101_0110011   //PC=52  or $x29,$x7,$x28
